text.div:
ObservationDateSearchParameter

Parameter date:date

Searches for observations by the observation date and time eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?date={date}

ResourceObservation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesObservation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ObservationDateSearchParameter
description: Searches for observations by the observation date and time eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?date={date}
